name: Paris Mountain State Park
description: Popular for its scenic climbs and challenging trails like the Paris Mountain Big Loop

name: Croft State Park
address: 450 Croft State Park Rd, Spartanburg, SC 29302
description: Over 20 miles of trails through woodlands and around lakes

name: Issaqueena Trails
description: Includes Dam Road, Rocky, and Collarbone Trail loops

name: Sesquicentennial State Park
description: Offers a sandy six-mile loop ideal for moderate rides

name: Poinsett State Park
description: Features the Knot Mountain Biking Trail and a race course loop

name: Long Cane Horse Trail
description: A figure-eight loop with over 50 km of intermediate terrain

name: Hunting Island State Park
address: 2555 Sea Island Pkwy, Hunting Island, SC 29920
description: Easy eight-mile trail along the lagoon and fishing pier

name: Marrington Plantation Trail
description: A 28 km intermediate ride through scenic forest

name: Biggin Creek Bike Trail
